name: FContentBrowserDataFilter
doc:
A filter used to control what is returned from Content Browser data queries.
@note The compiled version of this, FContentBrowserDataCompiledFilter, is produced via UContentBrowserDataSubsystem::CompileFilter.

bRecursivePaths: Whether we should include sub-paths in this query
ItemTypeFilter: Flags controlling which item types should be included in this query
ItemCategoryFilter: Flags controlling which item categories should be included in this query
ItemAttributeFilter: Flags controlling which item attributes should be included in this query
